name: Skinner & The Superintendent: The GBC Game!
name_original: Skinner & The Superintendent: The GBC Game!
description:
This Game was based on a scene of an episode of "The Simpsons" called "22 Shorts About Springfield" ,made just for fun and not owned by FOX or Disney.

(This banner image is just an illustration!)

*If you browser doesn't open the online game embed, play using the downloadable ROM!

*I'm not sure if the game saves correctly on online mode, but if you want to have sure play on an emulator. (Saves happen automatically after completing an ending and returning to title screen.)

*Current version only available in English, Portuguese will be added later.

Oh yeah, and you can skip the intro by holding START before It happens.
